[OUTCASTS ARMED]
	You've convinced the Outcasts that the Inquisition is approaching. In the event of an Inquisition attack the Outcasts will be prepared.
The outcast forces have responded to your request. Additional fire support will be provided during the fight!

[REPUTATION INCREASED - PIRATES]
